name: Isekaied (Antoineboulou)
description:
The basic idea was that you drink a coffee in your office and the world started to change from an modern time to a fantasy like. The player would have fighted monsters, go on quest but sometimes your illusion stoped and you were seeing that you hitting your coworkers.

But for some personal reason and because i made all the game in hybrid ecs (DOTS) so it was difficult to find documentation because it's still experimental. I couldn't finish my game and I stoped after I was starting to make the environement. 

PS : If someone now how to execute animation with hybrid ecs for skinned mesh with unity I'll be happy if you could give me a hint (didn't find on internet)
